sentences.english: The Reclining Buddha Temple is one of those temples well-known in Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 臥佛寺是在東南亞一帶享有盛名的寺廟之一。

sentences.english: Travel from Wofo Mountain Villa, its distance about 200 meters. You will arrive the old dragon lake.
sentences.chinese: 從臥佛山莊出發，北行200米，可到達古老的龍潭。

sentences.english: The White Jade Reclining Buddha is the biggest jade Buddha extant in China.
sentences.chinese: 白玉臥佛是中國現存最大的玉佛。

sentences.english: The big bell in the Temple of Reclining Buddha was recast in the sixteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 臥佛寺的大鐘是16世紀重新鑄造的。

definition: Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
Xuankong Temple or Suspended Temple near Yanyuan in Shanxi
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
